Articles.Content:
Then the skin and blood on the wall would spell out "KSP" and "Drift Stage" (for me at least)

What if you could survive re-entry with just a spacesuit and the RCS jetpack?

Then every space agency would do that for cost saving.

What if voyager 1 crashes into kerbin?

Then the Kerbal's Voyager crashes into Earth.

What if kerbals could dance?

They would never get anything done.

What if 1=2?

Then the universe has exploded and mathematical laws don't apply anymore.

What if I was the last human on earth?

then you won't be the first to be the last of your own.

what if when you miss idea you have an idea about it ?

hide at now, i date know, and ya ?

why the grumpy cat became famous ?

What if there was no such thing as electricity?

Then electromagnetism would be messed up, and our universe would be unimaginably different.

What if Earth is sentient, and things like the wind and storms are it's thoughts?

Then the Earth would have Saharan depression.

What if the answer to love was "Baby don't hurt me, don't hurt me, no more"

Nl Music band while rule the world

what if it always happen ... whatever ... and i m bored ... @like ... nevermind that's old i joined much later ; ) others question ? na ... oh cool ...
